text: "They Stood Up for Love" is a 2000 song by American alternative rock band Live and is the third and final single from their fourth studio album The Distance to Here. It went to number 88 in Australia, number 1 in Belgium, number 19 in the Netherlands and number 24 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart. ==Track listings== Australian CD single # "They Stood Up for Love" (radio mix) # "Run to the Water" (acoustic version) # "The Distance" (acoustic version) – 4:39 # "The Dolphin's Cry" (acoustic version) – 5:15 # "I Alone" (acoustic version) – 4:00 # "They Stood Up for Love" (acoustic version) – 4:17 European CD single 1 # "They Stood Up for Love" (acoustic version, recorded at Jet Studios, Brussels, Belgium) – 4:02 # "They Stood Up for Love" (radio mix) – 4:13 European CD single 2 # "They Stood Up for Love" (radio mix) # "I Alone" (acoustic version) # "The Dolphin's Cry" (acoustic version) # "They Stood Up for Love" (acoustic version) European maxi-CD single # "They Stood Up for Love" (radio mix) # "Run to the Water" (acoustic version) # "The Distance" (acoustic version) # "They Stood Up for Love" (acoustic version) ==References== Category:2000 songs Category:Live (band) songs
title: They Stood Up for Love
